item.title: 交易员关注简街禁令的印度到期日余波
item.description: 交易员们正在仔细检查印度的衍生品市场，观察简街集团被禁之后的异常交易迹象。虽然本交易日开盘平静，但随着到期日的到来，波动率和期权交易量成为市场关注的焦点。【原文：Traders are scrutinizing India’s derivatives market, watching for signs of unusual trading following a ban on Jane Street Group. While the session started calmly, volatility and options volume are on focus as the expiration day unfolds.】

item.title: 毛里求斯邀请瑞士财富管理公司促进金融业发展
item.description: 毛里求斯正在计划减税和减少官僚主义障碍，以吸引来自瑞士的财富经理和希望将部分资产保留在国外的印度富人。【原文：Mauritius is planning tax breaks and fewer bureaucratic hurdles to lure wealth managers from Switzerland and tap rich Indians looking to keep part of their assets outside the country.】

item.title: 优衣库因中国销售疲软利润不及预期
item.description: Fast Retailing Co. 公布的第三季度收益不及预期，原因是中国市场销售疲软拖累了这家日本服装制造商的业绩。【原文：Fast Retailing Co. reported third-quarter earnings that missed estimates, as weaker sales in China weighed on the Japanese apparel maker’s performance.】

item.title: 三星计划于 2025 年推出首款三折智能手机
item.description: 三星电子公司计划在今年晚些时候开始销售一款三折智能手机，与竞争对手华为技术有限公司一起开拓一个相对未经测试的市场。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. plans to begin selling a trifold smartphone later this year, joining rival Huawei Technologies Co. in exploring a relatively untested market.】

item.title: 日本央行分行经理报告显示利率将处于观望状态
item.description: 一份关于日本央行分行经理会议的报告对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的全面关税政策的影响未作明确说明，这凸显了日本央行在考虑再次加息之前的观望态度。【原文：A report on the Bank of Japan’s branch managers’ meeting offered little clarity over the impact of President Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs, underscoring the central bank’s wait-and-see mode before considering another interest rate hike.】

item.title: 供应充足，欧洲天然气波动率降至 2021 年以来最低点
item.description: 欧洲天然气市场的短期波动降至近四年来的最低水平，因为充足的供应盖过了对全球潜在需求激增的担忧。【原文：Short-term volatility in Europe’s natural gas market dropped to the lowest level in nearly four years as ample supply overshadows concerns about potential demand spikes across the globe.】

item.title: 挪威核心通胀率四个月来首次加快
item.description: 挪威的基本通胀率四个月来首次上升，基本符合预期，并巩固了央行在夏季之后采取更多宽松政策的前景。【原文：Norway’s underlying inflation rate rose for the first time in four months, largely matching expectations and cementing the central bank’s outlook for more easing after the summer.】

item.title: 关于未经证实的会议的报道引发中国房地产股大涨
item.description: 受下周将召开高级别会议帮助重振陷入困境的房地产行业的猜测推动，中国房地产股指数创下近九个月来的最大涨幅。【原文：A gauge of Chinese property shares posted its biggest gain in nearly nine months, fueled by speculation a high-level meeting will be held next week to help revive the struggling sector.】

item.title: 印度团队可能很快访问美国以推进贸易谈判
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的官员透露，一个印度贸易代表团可能在未来几天内访问华盛顿，就贸易协议展开进一步会谈。【原文：An Indian trade delegation is likely to visit Washington in the coming days for further talks on a trade deal, according to an official familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 甲骨文据称将在印度尼西亚推进云服务计划
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，甲骨文公司将与 DayOne Data Centers Singapore Pte 合作，在印度尼西亚建立首个云服务中心，从而加强与该地区重要运营商的合作关系。【原文：Oracle Corp. will partner with DayOne Data Centers Singapore Pte to establish its first cloud services center in Indonesia, people familiar with the matter said, boosting its partnership with a key regional operator that counts TikTok owner ByteDance Ltd as its largest customer.】

item.title: Binance 创始人家族办公室以 10 倍资本支持 BNB 游戏
item.description: Binance 联合创始人赵长鹏和何毅的家族办公室 YZi Labs 将支持投资公司 10X Capital 在美国成立一家上市公司，以投资 BNB。【原文：YZi Labs, the family office of Binance co-founders Changpeng Zhao and Yi He, will back investment firm 10X Capital to set up a publicly traded company in the US to invest in BNB, a token linked to the crypto exchange the pair started.】

item.title: A&M称，法国是欧洲受困企业最多的国家
item.description: 去年，由于劳动力市场疲软和商业情绪恶化，法国陷入财务困境的公司比例飙升幅度最大。【原文：France registered the biggest spike in the proportion of companies in financial distress last year as the country struggled with a weak labor market and deteriorating business sentiment.】

item.title: 亚马逊在德里开始 10 分钟送达服务，推动快速电子商务发展
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）已开始在新德里提供最快 10 分钟送达的服务，从而加剧了与当地竞争对手在增长最快的在线零售领域的竞争。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. has begun offering deliveries in as little as 10 minutes in New Delhi, revving up competition with local rivals in one of the fastest-growing segments of online retail.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将测试纪录，英镑走强
台积电收入增长 39%，这是人工智能消费热潮的最新迹象
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.’s revenue rose a better-than-anticipated 39% in the June quarter, buoying expectations for a sustained post-ChatGPT boom in AI spending.】

item.title: BlueFive Capital 为海湾私募股权基金融资 20 亿美元
item.description: BlueFive Capital — 由 Investcorp Holdings 的一位前高管创立 —，募集资金 20 亿美元，成为海湾地区投资者组建的最大基金之一。【原文：BlueFive Capital — founded by a former Investcorp Holdings executive — raised $2 billion in a move that places it among the biggest funds assembled by an investor based in the Gulf.】

item.title: 马斯克在反犹太主义争议后推出 Grok 4 人工智能聊天机器人
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能初创公司 xAI 在发布上一代产品几个月后就推出了 Grok 4，凸显了人工智能发展的迅猛速度。【原文：Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI is rolling out Grok 4 just months after releasing its previous iteration, underscoring the frenetic pace of AI development.】

item.title: 马来西亚对在最后期限前达成降低美国关税的协议持乐观态度
item.description: 马来西亚投资、贸易和工业部长扎弗鲁尔-阿齐兹（Zafrul Aziz）表示，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁要对东南亚国家征收更高的关税后，马来西亚对在8月1日贸易谈判截止日期前与美国达成降低关税协议持乐观态度。【原文：Malaysia is optimistic it can reach a deal with the US to lower tariffs ahead of the Aug. 1 deadline for trade talks after President Donald Trump threatened to impose a steeper levy on the Southeast Asian country, according to Investment, Trade and Industry Minister Zafrul Aziz.】

item.title: 中国建筑设备销售量激增，预示经济复苏
item.description: 上半年，中国主要建筑机械销量大幅增长，表明这一经济关键领域的需求有所改善。【原文：China’s key construction machinery sales jumped in the first half, indicating improving demand across the economically crucial sector.】

item.title: 50%的关税是惩罚，而非贸易
item.description:
如果说咖啡的价格还不够高，那么挤压巴西市场则意味着美国人将支付更高的价格。【原文：

As if coffee didn’t already cost enough, squeezing Brazil means Americans will pay even more.

】

item.title: 中国多晶硅价格因希望抑制竞争而飙升
item.description: 在中国最高领导层广泛承诺抑制企业间竞争后，中国的多晶硅价格出现了近两年来的最大涨幅，从而提振了对该行业前景的乐观情绪。【原文：Polysilicon prices in China jumped the most in almost two years after a broad pledge by the country’s top leadership to curb competition among businesses boosted optimism in the outlook for the industry.】

item.title: 美国因担心寄生蝇而暂停重启墨西哥牛贸易
item.description: 由于担心一种寄生蝇的传播，美国停止了从墨西哥进口牲畜，而就在几天前，墨西哥刚刚恢复了牲畜贸易。【原文：The US has halted livestock imports from Mexico on concerns over the spread of a parasitic fly, just days after the trade resumed.】

item.title: 曼哈顿房租再创新高，未来涨幅还会更大
item.description: 在过去五个月中，曼哈顿的租金第四次创下历史新高，而在市场最繁忙的季节，公寓买家的心情却丝毫没有放松的迹象。【原文：Manhattan rents hit a record high for the fourth time in the past five months — and there’s no relief in sight for apartment hunters in the market’s busiest season.】

item.title: 顶级首席执行官希望加拿大建立国防战略矿产储备
item.description: 据一个有影响力的商业团体称，加拿大应成为生产和加工军事装备和国防系统原材料的世界领导者。【原文：Canada should become a world leader in producing and processing raw materials for military equipment and defense systems, according to an influential business group.】

item.title: 非洲各国央行权衡特朗普关税下的政策选择
item.description: 非洲主要经济体将在未来几周内确定不同的利率政策，因为它们要衡量美国总统唐纳德-特朗普新关税提案的影响及其对本国经济和通胀的影响。【原文：Key African economies are set to stake out different approaches to interest rates in the coming weeks as they gauge the impact of US President Donald Trump’s new tariff proposals and their domestic influences on their economies and inflation.】

item.title: NTT 出售 177 亿美元外国债券，创亚洲交易纪录
item.description: 日本电信巨头 NTT 公司周三出售了 177 亿美元的美元和欧元债券，创下了亚洲企业在全球债务市场发行债券的最大纪录。【原文：Japanese telecom giant NTT Inc. sold $17.7 billion of dollar and euro bonds on Wednesday, marking the biggest-ever offering by an Asian corporate in the global debt market.】

item.title: 降息后马来西亚债券外流可能昙花一现
item.description: 马来西亚本周降息，可能会助长对进一步宽松政策的押注，马来西亚主权债券市场看来有望从近期的抛售压力中反弹。【原文：Malaysia’s sovereign bond market looks poised to bounce back from recent selling pressure, after a rate cut this week that may fuel bets on further easing.】

item.title: 日本 20 年期债券销售需求低于 12 个月平均水平
item.description: 日本 20 年期国债拍卖的需求低于过去 12 个月的平均水平，因为即将举行的大选凸显了日本主权债务继续上升的可能性。【原文：Demand at Japan’s 20-year government bond auction was lower than the average over the past 12 months, as an upcoming election highlights the likelihood that the nation’s sovereign debt will keep rising.】

item.title: 美国征税在即，中国呼吁东南亚支持开放
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁对东南亚各国征收全面关税之际，中国外交部长王毅周四呼吁东南亚各国坚持开放与合作，传递出包容性的信息。【原文：Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi called on Southeast Asian nations to uphold openness and cooperation Thursday, delivering a message of inclusivity as President Donald Trump threatens sweeping tariffs on nations across the region.】

item.title: 富士媒体提出毒丸辩护后股价下跌
item.description: 富士媒体控股公司（Fuji Media Holdings Inc.【原文：Fuji Media Holdings Inc. shares fell 4.2% after the broadcaster said it’s considering measures to stop one of Japan’s most prominent activist investors from gaining control of the firm.】
